en_text: Die! Die!
jp_text: ううっ！　ハア ハア…

en_text: Dad was...
jp_text: ああっ… ああ…

en_text:
Dad was forced to endure this
for years?!
jp_text:
親父(おやじ)は こんなものを
何年間も背負わされたっていうのか
google_translated:
My father  is such
How many years have been backed?

en_text:
When I was young, I used to aspire
to becoming a champion of justice.
jp_text:
（衛宮切嗣(きりつぐ)）
子供の頃
僕は正義の味方に憧れてた
google_translated:
As a child
I was in love with the friend of justice

en_text:
Leave it to me. I'll make
your dreams a reality.
jp_text:
じいさんの夢は
俺が ちゃんと形にしてやっから
google_translated:
Your dream is
I made it with her properly

en_text:
Thanks.
That's a relief.
jp_text:
（士郎）
そうだ

en_text:
The son of a champion
of justice, then...
jp_text:
衛宮士郎が 本当に衛宮切嗣の…
正義の味方の息子なら…
google_translated:
Shiro Emiya is really Esomiya Kirishima ...
If it is a son of the friend of justice ...

en_text:
If you're going to do this,
win even if it kills you.
jp_text:
（遠坂(とおさか)凛(りん)）
士郎　やるからには
死んでも勝ちなさい
google_translated:
凛 )
Because it is Shiro
Win even death

en_text:
Plus, it is only right that Kotomine
should be defeated by you.
jp_text:
（セイバー）
言峰(ことみね)は あなたが倒すべき敵だ
google_translated: Dominee is an enemy that you should defeat

en_text:
...I'm not gonna be
beaten by that guy!
jp_text:
（士郎）
あの男には負けられない！
google_translated: I can not lose to that man!

en_text: Fate Stay Night...
jp_text: あっ

en_text:
Impossible!
You shook off my curse?
jp_text: もはや万策尽きたということか

en_text: You are...
jp_text: お前が

en_text:
You just escaped from there, and yet
here you are acting rashly again.
jp_text:
あれから逃れたかと思えば
その短絡思考
google_translated:
If you think that it has escaped from that
Its short circuit thinking

en_text:
Shut up! I never had
any plans in the first place!
jp_text:
うるさい！
初めっから 策なんて持ってねえ
google_translated:
Noisy!
Having a plan for the first time

en_text: Excalibur!
jp_text: エクスカリバー！

en_text:
If this is my duty, then there's
one more thing that I can do...
jp_text:
（士郎）
これが俺の役目なら

en_text: You were my...
jp_text:
（セイバー）
あなたは 私の鞘(さや)だったのですね

en_text: Trace, on!
jp_text:
（士郎）
トレース･オン

en_text:
The utopia that she
dreamed of...
jp_text:
（士郎）
彼女が 夢見た理想郷
google_translated: The ideal town that she dreamed

en_text:
- Its name is... Avalon!
- Its name is... Avalon!
jp_text:
（士郎･セイバー）
その名は…

en_text: Projection magic?!
jp_text: と… 投影魔術だと！？
google_translated: And ... If it is projection magic!?

en_text: Läßt!
jp_text:
（刺す音）
（言峰）うわっ！

en_text: Avalon...
jp_text:
（ギルガメッシュ）
アヴァロン…

en_text:
The name of the utopia that the king is
said to have gone to after his death...
jp_text:
かの王が 死後に
たどり着くといわれる理想郷
google_translated:
After the king of
An ideal town that is said to arrive

en_text:
The ultimate defense
that nothing can penetrate,
jp_text: 何ものにも侵害されぬ究極の守り
google_translated: Ultimate protection that is not violated for anything

en_text:
The power of the sacred sword
that legends speak of?
jp_text: 伝説にいう聖剣の力か
google_translated: Is the power of the holy sword in the legend?

en_text: You are a vile woman...
jp_text: 憎らしい女だ

en_text:
You defy me to
the bitter end?
jp_text: 最後まで この俺に刃向かうか
google_translated: Go to me until the end

en_text: Still, I will forgive you.
jp_text: だが許そう

en_text:
Some things are all the more beautiful
because they are unattainable.
jp_text:
手に入らぬからこそ
美しいものもある
google_translated:
You can not get it
There are also beautiful things

en_text:
Farewell, then,
knight king.
jp_text: ではな 騎士王

en_text:
How can this be? How can you
possibly have this dagger?
jp_text: なぜ お前がこの剣を持っている

en_text:
I see... I once gave it to a certain
little girl on a whim.
jp_text: どこぞの娘にくれてやった

en_text:
That was, what,
ten years ago?
jp_text: あれは確か 10年前か

en_text:
I see... It's no wonder that
I've grown weaker...
jp_text:
なるほど
私も衰えるはずだ
google_translated:
So that's it
I should also decline

en_text:
I will destroy
the Holy Grail.
jp_text: 聖杯を破壊します

en_text:
Master, give the order.
Without your command, I cannot destroy it.
jp_text:
あなたの命(めい)がなければ
あれは破壊できない
google_translated:
Without your life
I can not destroy that

en_text:
Use your last
Command Seal.
jp_text: 最後の令呪(れいじゅ)を使ってください
google_translated: Please use the last decree curse

en_text:
Shirou... I want to hear you
say it in your own voice.
jp_text: あなたの声で聞かせてほしい
google_translated: I want you to tell you in your voice

en_text:
But...
But...
jp_text: はっ…

en_text: Yeah. This is the end.
jp_text: これで終わりだ

en_text:
I have been your blade and slain your
enemies, and I have protected you.
jp_text:
（セイバー）
あなたの剣となり敵を討ち
御身を守った
google_translated:
Become your sword and kill enemies
Protected

en_text: Shirou, I love you.
jp_text: あなたを愛している

en_text: Sempai! Sempai!
jp_text:
（間桐桜(まとう さくら)）
先輩　先輩

en_text: Good morning.
jp_text: おはようございます

en_text:
I could've at least cooked breakfast
this time!
jp_text: 朝食の支度できてますよ　先輩

en_text:
I can't get going in the morning
if I don't follow the same routine.
jp_text:
（桜）
いつもと同じ朝を迎えないと
調子が出ないんです
google_translated:
If you do not have the same morning as usual
I can't get out

en_text: Oh. Sorry.
jp_text:
（士郎）
そっか　悪(わり)い

en_text: Taiga! Stop this thing!
jp_text:
（イリヤ）
大河(たいが)！　止まりなさい

en_text: Brake! Brake!
jp_text:
（藤村(ふじむら)大河）
ブレーキよ　ブレーキ

en_text: Gee, I'm flattered.
jp_text: バイクを素手で受け止めるなんて
google_translated: I'm going to accept my bike with battles

en_text:
Just give the word, Shirou.
I'll kill Taiga in her sleep.
jp_text:
士郎　遠慮せずに言いなさい
いつでも 大河の寝首 かいてあげる
google_translated:
Do not hesitate to say
I will always sleep in the dust of the large river

en_text:
Watch it, or I'll throw you out
with the rest of the trash!
jp_text: 生ゴミの日にポイしちゃうぞ
google_translated: I will poke on the day of raw garbage

en_text:
- You little demon spawn!
- What did you say?!
jp_text: 何よ それ！

en_text:
Wow, fried tofu first thing
in the morning!
jp_text: 朝から 揚げ出し豆腐

en_text:
Taiga, don't make
a scene.
jp_text:
（イリヤ）
大河は私を手放さないわ
google_translated: Taiga does not let me go

en_text:
I mean it!
Out with the trash!
jp_text:
（後藤(ごとう)）
好きだー！

en_text: No!
jp_text:
（大河）
いやーん

en_text:
It's because you said you liked
it so much last time.
jp_text: おいしいって言ってくれたから

en_text:
I'm in love!
I'm in love with myself!
jp_text: 俺は俺が大好きだー！

en_text: What's with him?
jp_text:
（生徒）
何だ？　あれ

en_text:
So, I hear a new priest's come
to the Kotomine church.
jp_text:
（士郎）
言峰教会に
新しい神父が来たらしいな
google_translated:
To the Church
New Father seems to come

en_text:
I thought you'd be
more depressed.
jp_text: もっと落ち込んでいるかと思った
google_translated: I thought it was more dropped

en_text:
As if! I would've kicked you in the butt
and snapped you out of it inside of a day!
jp_text:
まさか　蹴り入れて
１日で立ち直らせてやったわよ
google_translated:
I kick it
I did it in one day

en_text: Yeah...
jp_text:
（凛）な… 何よ
（士郎）いや

en_text:
My memories might
fade one day,
jp_text: いつか記憶が薄れて―

en_text:
...and I'll start to forget her voice
or her mannerisms.
jp_text:
（凛）
士郎の中では決着をつけたのね
google_translated: I decided to settle in Shiro

en_text: Shirou!
jp_text: あっ 士郎

en_text:
Go on ahead
without me!
jp_text:
（士郎）
先に行っててくれ

en_text:
King Arthur... I shall fetch
the troops at once.
jp_text:
（ベディヴィエール）
アーサー王

en_text:
Stay here and rest
for now.
jp_text: 今はこちらに

en_text: Bedivere...
jp_text:
（アーサー）
ベディヴィエール

en_text:
You have regained
consciousness, sire?
jp_text: あっ　意識が戻られましたか
google_translated: Did you get a sense of awareness?

en_text:
Yes, I was briefly
dreaming...
jp_text:
（アーサー）
うん

en_text:
Yes, it is something that I do so rarely...
It was a precious experience.
jp_text:
（ベディヴィエール）
夢ですか

en_text:
In that case, please rest
without worry, sire.
jp_text:
（ベディヴィエール）
では お気遣いなく
お休みください
google_translated:
Then without concern
Please take a break

en_text:
To continue the dream...
Can I dream the same dream?
jp_text: 同じ夢を見られるのか？
google_translated: Can you see the same dream?

en_text:
Yes, sire. I have experienced it myself.
One must wish hard enough.
jp_text: はい　私にも経験があります

en_text:
I see... You are a man
of varied knowledge.
jp_text: そなたは博識だな

en_text: Bedivere, take my sword.
jp_text: 我が剣を投げ入れよ

en_text:
Listen closely. Go through this forest
and over that blood-soaked hill.
jp_text:
この森を抜け
あの血塗られた丘を越えるのだ
google_translated:
Remove this forest
It crosses that bloody hill

en_text:
She feels so close, but I can't touch her
when I reach out my hand.
jp_text: 手を伸ばしても つかめない
google_translated: I can not get caught by stretching my hand

en_text:
But even if I can't touch her, there has
to be something left in our hearts.
jp_text:
それでも…　届かなくとも
胸に残るものはあるだろう
google_translated:
Still ... I can not reach
There will be something left in the chest

en_text:
We existed in the same time
and looked up at the same sky.
jp_text:
同じ時間にいて
同じものを見上げた
google_translated:
At the same time
I saw the same thing

en_text:
If we remember that, I can believe that we're
with each other even if we're far apart.
jp_text:
遠く離れていても
共にあると信じられる
google_translated:
Even if it is far away
I believe it is both

en_text:
For now,
I'll keep on running.
jp_text: 今は走り続ける
google_translated: I will continue to run now

en_text:
If I aim for what's
in the distance,
jp_text:
遠くを目指していれば
いつかは―
google_translated:
If you aim for a distance
Eventually-

en_text:
Majesty, I have returned your sword
to the hand of the Lady of the Lake.
jp_text:
（ベディヴィエール）
王　剣は湖の婦人の手に 確かに
google_translated: King Sword Certainly in the hand of the lake

en_text:
My slumber this time
will be a long one...
jp_text: 少し… 長く…

en_text:
Are you dreaming,
King Arthur?
jp_text:
（ベディヴィエール）
見ているのですか？　アーサー王
google_translated: Are you looking at? King Arthur

en_text:
Guuzen ja nai futari deaeta no wa.
It wasn't chance that brought us together.
